import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faEdit } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import React from 'react' import './BlogPost.css'; const BlogPost = ({setPost}) => { const editbtn = return (
{setPost.map(el => (

{el.title}

{el.author}

{el.date}

{el.content}

))}
) } export default BlogPost
